availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Waggener (Union County, Kentucky, deputy clerk)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, deputy court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Harrison W. Waggener and Catherine Graham Waggener. Married to Bettie Hayes Waggener. Father of Eulah Lee Waggener. Attended school in Union County in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Attended school in Union County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Union County in 1860. Deputy Clerk of the Union County Court in 1865.
